<script>
  // Function to toggle the text box visibility and change the circle color when clicked
  function toggleInfo(infoId, circleId) {
    var infoBox = document.getElementById(infoId);
    var circle = document.getElementById(circleId);

    // Toggle text box visibility
    if (infoBox.style.display === "none" || infoBox.style.display === "") {
      infoBox.style.display = "block";
      // Change circle color to indicate it's clicked
      circle.classList.add('clicked');
    } else {
      infoBox.style.display = "none";
      // Remove the clicked class when hiding the info box
      circle.classList.remove('clicked');
    }
  }

  // Hide the text box and reset circle color when clicking outside
  document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
    var circle = document.getElementById('circle1');
    var infoBox = document.getElementById('info1');

    // Ensure we are not triggering the hide when clicking on the circle or info box itself
    if (!circle.contains(event.target) && !infoBox.contains(event.target)) {
      infoBox.style.display = 'none';  // Hide the info box
      circle.classList.remove('clicked');  // Reset the circle color
    }
  });

  // Prevent event bubbling when clicking on the circle or info box
  document.getElementById('circle1').addEventListener('click', function(event) {
    event.stopPropagation();
  });

  document.getElementById('info1').addEventListener('click', function(event) {
    event.stopPropagation();
  });
</script>
